entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
